tool_description:
Premier League Football Injury API. 

This API provides a data feed of injured or suspended players for each Premier League club. Use cases include helping choose players in your Fantasy League and making bets based on player availability. The list is updated 48 hours before each Match Day.

This API is also available via a modern and stylish widget. Contact Support@Kablenett.com if interested in the widget.
name: Fantasy Premier League Football Injury Update
title: Fantasy Premier League Football Injury Update
tool_name: Fantasy Premier League Football Injury Update

api_list.name: GET
api_list.description: Get current injured and suspended players from the Premier League.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league-football-injury-update.p.rapidapi.com/api/InjuriesAPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league-football-injury-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
